name: Beat Cat!
description:
In Beat Cat, you can design a song and record it, or you can just experience different interesting and funny instruments. If you are a lover of kittens or you are interested in casual music game, do not miss Beat Cat. Come drop the beat and play your cat music! Meow~

Features:
-Easy and relaxing.
-Lovely cat images.
-Various funny instruments.
-Special performance for hidden beat.
-Play your own music with creativity.
